title: Kandi Koated Nights
overview: Kandi Koated Nights is an adaptation of the web series with the same name, featuring host Kandi and comedians Yamaneika Saunders, Nikki Nicole, The DJ AOne, and topical experts, to dish on a myriad of topics and give their opinions on the theme of the night. From taking a deep dive into the digital dating age to discussing the do's and don'ts of relationships, nothing is off limits when Kandi makes her saucy talk show debut.
